Posted By: LeafWheels (1/27/2011 2:50:07 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
I'm going blue, black, this guy (for mana), [corrupted conscience](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=corrupted conscience) (for fun), [hand of the praetors](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=hand of the praetors)(for poison), a few infect creatures, alot of proliferate, and then I'll watch it happen; slowly, you'll die, one counter at a time. I'll watch you grimace as I add each drop, I'll tap the cards nice and slowly and see you reel and writhe until you bow to me as my new servent.
  
Now that I have that out of my system, I like to think that this guy is the start of a beautiful future for infect and poison, but there's still that nagging problem: Using control stratagies and poison to take down the enemy is (even with this guy) still too slow and risky as there aren't many good static defences around for blue and black. Infect and poison still seems to be in the hands of green pump spells.
posts.html:
